hero_description: I build accessible, pixel-perfect digital experiences for the web.

about_section.title: Brittany Chiang
about_section.description_1: I’m a Frontend Developer focused on crafting smooth, intuitive, and high-performance web experiences. To me, a great interface isn’t just about how it looks — it’s about how it feels: responsive, accessible, and thoughtfully built, where engineering and creativity intersect to create meaningful digital experiences.
about_section.description_2: I’m currently developing my expertise in modern Frontend technologies such as React, Next.js, and TypeScript, while exploring Web 3D (Three.js) and motion design to bring a more dynamic and expressive layer to the web.
about_section.description_3: I’ve built several real-world products including BookZone, Beef Beef Restaurant, and Finnng.io.vn, handling everything from UI architecture and responsive design to performance optimization. I’m currently working at a tech company in Ho Chi Minh City as a Frontend Developer, where I focus on developing and optimizing internal UI component systems — refining my ability to design at scale and maintain consistency and usability across products.
about_section.description_4: I was honored to receive Second Place at FPT Hackathon 2025 for a project that explored creative, user-centered web solutions. These days, I’m diving deeper into motion, micro-interactions, and Web 3D, aiming to craft interfaces that are not only efficient and visually refined but also emotionally engaging.

short_term_goals.title: Short-term Goals
short_term_goals.goal_1: Develop in-depth Frontend skills, especially in React, Next.js, and TypeScript.
short_term_goals.goal_2: Enhance teamwork skills in an Agile/Scrum environment.
short_term_goals.goal_3: Improve IT-related English skills to communicate and read technical documents better.

long_term_goals.title: Long-term Goals
long_term_goals.goal_1: Become a professional Frontend Developer, capable of building smooth UI/UX, optimizing performance, and improving user experience.
long_term_goals.goal_2: Expand knowledge in Backend (Node.js, NestJS, MongoDB/PostgreSQL) to become a Full Stack Developer.
long_term_goals.goal_3: Continuously update on new technologies, enhance programming thinking, and problem-solving skills.
